column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I could go on about the classy yet cozy ambiance
column3: the overflowing chocolate sundae we somehow managed to put back at the end of our meal
column4: but now I'm just gilding the lily - you get the point. If you're in Chicago and you don't go here
column5: you need to seriously rethink your priorities. And if you're not in Chicago
column6: you just may want to plan a trip there just to go to Bavette's. It's that good.
